data.descripcion: This career is very interesting since it is too extensive, what I like a lot is that there are many branches where we can work depending on what each of us does best
data.tecnologias: Technologies I use:  JavaScript. With this multiplatform programming language it is possible to give websites greater interactivity and dynamism. ... HTML. ...CSS. ...Backend or server-side technologies. ...PHP. ...Python. ...Angular. ...React.
